title: Ideal gas law - T change from PV diagram

content.question: A sample of an ideal gas in a closed container with a moveable piston is taken from State <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> to State <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> by a thermodynamic process in which the gas expands, and the temperature of the gas at State <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Y</mtext></math> is less than the temperature of the gas at State <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext></math>.
